pageContext.claim: “But they do give Dr. Anthony Fauci, who is with us in all ways, a very high 72% Approval Rating. So, if he is in charge along with V.P. etc., and with us doing all of these really good things, why doesn't the Lamestream Media treat us as they should? Answer: Because they are Fake News!”
pageContext.analysis: Jealousies aside,Trump routinely contradicts, disregards and undermines Fauci's expert advice. Fauci, the nation's top infectious disease official, had not spoken to Trump for about a month -- at the height of the pandemic -- when the president tweeted this claim that Fauci "is with us in all ways" and "in charge."
